dataquery.name: WorkingQueue
dataquery.sql: SELECT S.APPEARANCE_DT AS 'AppearanceDate' ,CASE WHEN ETP.MULTI_PARTIES = 'Y' THEN PS.DISPLAYNAME + ' ET AL.' ELSE PS.DISPLAYNAME END AS 'PartyName' ,ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),S.ISSUE_DT, 101), '|') AS 'IssueDate' ,ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),S.SERVED_DT, 101), '|') AS 'ServiceDate' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(S.COMMENTS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(S.COMMENTS, '|') END AS 'Comments' ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(s.executed,'N')='N' THEN 'No' ELSE 'Yes' END AS 'Executed' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(HOW_SERVED_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(HOW_SERVED_DESC, '|') END AS 'ServiceDesc' ,P.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,FC.CASE_NUMBER AS 'CaseNumber' ,S.EVENT_ENTRY_ID AS 'EventEntryID' ,ET.EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID AS 'EventEntryTypeID' ,ee.EVENT_ENTRY_DESC As 'EventDesc' FROM ACM_SUMMON S LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENTRY EE ON S.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID AND EE.VOID = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT EVENT_ENTRY_ID,MIN(TETP.PARTY_ID) AS PARTY_ID, CASE WHEN COUNT(TETP.PARTY_ID) > 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MULTI_PARTIES FROM ACM_EVENT_TO_PARTY TETP GROUP BY EVENT_ENTRY_ID) ETP ON EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = ETP.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_PARTY P ON ETP.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_FACTS_CASE FC ON FC.CASE_ID = P.CASE_ID AND FC.VOID <> 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_PERSON PS ON P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = PS.PERSON_ALIAS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENT_TYP ET ON EE.EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID = ET.EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_PERSON P1 ON P1.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = S.SERVICE_PROVIDER_PERSON_ALIAS_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_HOW_SERVED HS ON S.HOW_SERVED_ID = HS.HOW_SERVED_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_CASE_TYP CT ON FC.CASE_TYP_ID = CT.CASE_TYP_ID WHERE CT.CASE_TYP_CD NOT IN ('ADP','COM') AND FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.REMOVE_PUBLICACCESS_FLG <> 'Y'

dataquery.name: Incremental
dataquery.sql: SELECT S.APPEARANCE_DT AS 'AppearanceDate' ,CASE WHEN ETP.MULTI_PARTIES = 'Y' THEN PS.DISPLAYNAME + ' ET AL.' ELSE PS.DISPLAYNAME END AS 'PartyName' ,ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),S.ISSUE_DT, 101), '|') AS 'IssueDate' ,ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),S.SERVED_DT, 101), '|') AS 'ServiceDate' ,S.COMMENTS AS 'Comments' ,CASE WHEN ISNULL(s.executed,'N')='N' THEN 'No' ELSE 'Yes' END AS 'Executed' ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(HOW_SERVED_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(HOW_SERVED_DESC, '|') END AS 'ServiceDesc' ,P.CASE_ID AS 'CaseID' ,FC.CASE_NUMBER AS 'CaseNumber' ,S.EVENT_ENTRY_ID AS 'EventEntryID' ,ET.EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID AS 'EventEntryTypeID' ,ee.EVENT_ENTRY_DESC As 'EventDesc' FROM ACM_SUMMON S LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENTRY EE ON S.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID AND EE.VOID = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT EVENT_ENTRY_ID,MIN(TETP.PARTY_ID) AS PARTY_ID, CASE WHEN COUNT(TETP.PARTY_ID) > 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MULTI_PARTIES FROM ACM_EVENT_TO_PARTY TETP GROUP BY EVENT_ENTRY_ID) ETP ON EE.EVENT_ENTRY_ID = ETP.EVENT_ENTRY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_PARTY P ON ETP.PARTY_ID = P.PARTY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_FACTS_CASE FC ON FC.CASE_ID = P.CASE_ID AND FC.VOID <> 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_PERSON PS ON P.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = PS.PERSON_ALIAS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_EVENT_ENT_TYP ET ON EE.EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID = ET.EVENT_ENTRY_TYP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ACM_PERSON P1 ON P1.PERSON_ALIAS_ID = S.SERVICE_PROVIDER_PERSON_ALIAS_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_HOW_SERVED HS ON S.HOW_SERVED_ID = HS.HOW_SERVED_ID LEFT JOIN ACM_CASE_TYP CT ON FC.CASE_TYP_ID = CT.CASE_TYP_ID WHERE CT.CASE_TYP_CD NOT IN ('ADP','COM') AND FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.SEALED_CASE_FLG <> 'Y' AND FC.REMOVE_PUBLICACCESS_FLG <> 'Y' AND (S.DATE_TIME_CREATED > DATEADD(HH,-2,GETDATE()) OR S.DATE_TIME_MOD > DATEADD(HH,-2,GETDATE()))
